instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.U7201: What is U7201? U7201 is responsible for the 3.3v and 5v power rails on many devices..
definitions.SMC_PM_G2_EN: What is SMC_PM_G2_EN? SMC_PM_G2_EN is a signal that comes from the SMC that is a prerequsite for all of the enable signals for the S5 rails to come on, such as P3V3S5_EN. S5 rails will not come on if SMC_PM_G2_EN is not coming..
definitions.P3V3S5_EN_L: What is P3V3S5_EN_L? P3V3S5_EN_L is a signal that enables the power chip responsible for creating PP3V3_S5 when it is low. .
definitions.PP3V3_S5_REG: What is PP3V3_S5_REG? PP3V3_S5_REG is a 3.3v power rail present when the machine is in an S5 soft off state. .
definitions.PPVCORE_S0_CPU: What is PPVCORE_S0_CPU? This is the primary power rail for the CPU that powers the CPU, known as CPU vcore. Without this, the machine will be braindead. .

threads.title: 820 2879 B , Green light but don't turn on
threads.message:
Good Morning, 

Board 820 2879 B, i have a green light but don't turn on.. missing =<SIGNAL>PP5V_S3_REG</SIGNAL> .. have 0V, and no short to ground in same lane.. 

where should i look ?

cumps

where i look ?

threads.title: 820 2879 B , Green light but don't turn on
threads.message: <SIGNAL>MCPCORES0_EN</SIGNAL> present? If yes check for a short on L7560 to GND. If not 0 Ohm then could be dead <CHIP>U7500</CHIP> or something around it.

threads.title: 820 2879 B , Green light but don't turn on
threads.message: yes, i have 16.3V and short to ground in l7560. =(

threads.title: 820 2879 B , Green light but don't turn on
threads.message: How low is resistance to GND on L7560, it is quite low normally.

threads.title: 820 2879 B , Green light but don't turn on
threads.message: in Diode mode i have short to ground.. And the resistance i have 11 ohms
